alert.note: Alert for Camden; Pasquotank; Perquimans (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 12 at 8:46PM EDT until June 12 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 915 PM EDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL CAMDEN...SOUTHEASTERN PASQUOTANK AND SOUTHEASTERN PERQUIMANS COUNTIES... At 846 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Nixonton, or near Weeksville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. This severe storm will be near... Elizabeth City around 850 PM EDT. Elizabeth City State University around 855 PM EDT. Weeksville and Whitehall Shores around 900 PM EDT. Shiloh around 910 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Bob White Fork, Pasquotank, Jacocks, Rabbit Corner, Stevenson Point, Symonds Creek, Listers Corner, Woodville, Bartlett and Taylors Beach. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
